name: Parasect
flavorText:
A host-parasite
pair in which the
parasite mushroom has taken over the
host bug. Prefers
damp places.

previous.name: Paras
previous.flavorText:
Burrows to suck
tree roots. The
mushrooms on its back grow by draw­
ing nutrients from
the bug host.

next.name: Venonat
next.flavorText:
Lives in the
shadows of tall
trees where it eats insects. It
is attracted by
light at night.
